name: Github Image Resizer
description: Resizes images pushed to Github and saves them to S3, replacing the original on Github with a lo-res version

GITHUB_SECRET.description: Use the same secret for the webhook in Github. Any random string will do

HOSTNAME.description: The hostname of this app e.g. https://THIS_APP_ID.herokuapp.com

VALID_REPOS.description: A comma-separated list of repos that can post webhooks, of the format user/reponame

WATCH_FOLDER.description: A folder to watch for images. By default any image in the repo triggers the webhook

IMAGE_SIZES.description: A comma-separated list of image sizes (width) to resize to
